jrds.snmp
Class SnmpRequester

java.lang.Object
  jrds.snmp.SnmpRequester
public abstract class SnmpRequester
extends Object

An abstract class to generate simple SNMP requesters which gets a probe, a collection of ois and make snmp requests based on those oid

Author:
Fabrice Bacchella

Field Summary
static SnmpRequester RAW
          The simplest requester Just get a collection of oid and return the associated value
static SnmpRequester SIMPLE
          Collect a set of variable by append .0 to the OID of the oid the returned OID are left unchanged
static SnmpRequester TABULAR
          A requester used to read an array of oid
 
Method Summary
abstract  SnmpVars doSnmpGet(SnmpProbe probe, Collection oidsSet)
          The method that need to be implemented to do the request
static void start()
          Start the SNMP environement should be called only once
static void stop()
          stop an openened snmp environnement
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

doSnmpGet

public abstract SnmpVars doSnmpGet(SnmpProbe probe,
                                   Collection oidsSet)
The method that need to be implemented to do the request

Parameters:
probe - the probe that does the request
oidsSet - a collection to be request
Returns:
a map of the snmp values read
